metadata.title: CVE-2014-3941 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: TYPO3 4.5.0 before 4.5.34, 4.7.0 before 4.7.19, 6.0.0 before 6.0.14, 6.1.0before 6.1.9, and 6.2.0 before 6.2.3 allows remote attackers to haveunspecified impact via a crafted HTTP Host header, related to "HostSpoofing."

criterions.comment: typo3-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
